title: Gobi's Valley
description: This level has some RNG due to the rings. In all categories there are a variety of different routes you can use depending on your skill level. In Any% this level is visited as the Bee only.

general.name: Flightless Gobi Rings
general.description: Getting through the rings without flying can be accomplished a few times by manipulating the camera movement to spawn the rings at will. You can also jump onto another ring without flying if it spawns to the back left of the Jinxy ring.

general.name: Another Method for a Flightless Gobi Ring
general.description: Another method for a flightless ring

general.name: Beak Bombing for Grabba's Jiggy
general.description: It's faster to get Grabba's jiggy while in flight by beak bombing.

general.name: Fastest Possible Matching Pyramid
general.description: Routing for a quick matching pyramid

general.name: Mathing Pyramid Pattern
general.description: This is the optimal path for the matching pyramid.

general.name: Jinxy Notes with Speed Shoes
general.description: Getting the notes around Jinxy using the speed shoes. A strat used in various categories.

general.name: Sandybutt's Pyramid Maze Skip
general.description: By jumping off of the wall you can get on top of the maze and skip it with some manuevering.

general.name: Cactus Honeycomb Flightless
general.description: Through damage boosting it is possible to get the circular cactus honeycomb flightless. This is not used in any categories currently, but it's dope.

outofbounds.name: Gobi Clip
outofbounds.description: You can clip into the side of Jinxy and get inside without opening the door. This trick is not recommended for beginners.

outofbounds.name: Water Pyramid Clip
outofbounds.description: While flying, you can clip into the side of the water pyramid. This skips having to race to the door in Turbo Trot.

outofbounds.name: Out of Bounds as the Bee (PAL)
outofbounds.description: This is a the PAL version of this trick, it is done differently in NTSC. You can clip out of bounds as the Bee in Gobi's to get inside Rubee's pyramid.
